org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core

Interface ICoreMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Message
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientMessage

    public interface ICoreMessage
extends Message
    This interface is only to determine the API of methods required for Core Messages
